stories.Title: Databricks: Advancing the democratization of AI
stories.Description: The company recently announced the acquisition of MosaicML, with the aim of creating a unified platform for enterprises and bringing more control over their data.
stories.Tweet: Databricks: Advancing the democratization of AI 📦 The company recently announced the acquisition of MosaicML, with the aim of creating a unified platform for enterprises and bringing more control over their data. #ai https://venturebeat.com/data-infrastructure/databricks-is-acquiring-mosaicml-for-a-jaw-dropping-1-3-billion/

stories.Title: The role of AI in medicine
stories.Description: AI brings hope for treating and potentially curing genetic diseases. Scientists worldwide are harnessing the power of AI tools to develop new drugs that are both effective and affordable.
stories.Tweet: The role of AI in medicine 📦 AI brings hope for treating and potentially curing genetic diseases. Scientists worldwide are harnessing the power of AI tools to develop new drugs that are both effective and affordable. #ai https://www.fastcompany.com/90913935/how-generative-ai-could-help-to-cure-untreatable-diseases

stories.Title: Expand your perspective with Midjourney
stories.Description: Midjourney's latest update brings limitless creativity to users. The new "Zoom Out" function generates captivating scenes that extend beyond the central image.
stories.Tweet: Expand your perspective with Midjourney 📦 Midjourney's latest update brings limitless creativity to users. The new "Zoom Out" function generates captivating scenes that extend beyond the central image. #midjourney https://www.techspot.com/news/99191-midjourney-52-introduces-zoom-out-feature-generates-scenes.html

stories.Title: GPT to outer space
stories.Description: NASA is working on a conversational AI system, similar to ChatGPT, that enables astronauts to interact with space vehicles in order to seek advice, receive alerts, or perform maneuvers easily.
stories.Tweet: GPT to outer space 📦 NASA is working on a conversational AI system, similar to ChatGPT, that enables astronauts to interact with space vehicles in order to seek advice, receive alerts, or perform maneuvers easily. #NASA https://www.engadget.com/nasa-is-creating-a-chatgpt-like-assistant-for-astronauts-081903604.html

stories.Title: ChatGPT gets a vintage touch
stories.Description: WinGPT is an app that brings AI to Windows 3.1 PCs, proving that even old-school machines can stay up to date with the chatbot frenzy.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT gets a vintage touch 📦 WinGPT is an app that brings AI to Windows 3.1 PCs, proving that even old-school machines can stay up to date with the chatbot frenzy. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/26/23773756/wingpt-chat-gpt-app-windows-3-1

stories.Title: Starship is being renewed
stories.Description: As it gears up for its upcoming launch. Elon Musk has announced the adoption of hot-staging for stage separation, a technique that increases payload performance.
stories.Tweet: Starship is being renewed 📦 As it gears up for its upcoming launch. Elon Musk has announced the adoption of hot-staging for stage separation, a technique that increases payload performance. #spacex https://spacenews.com/spacex-changing-starship-stage-separation-ahead-of-next-launch/

stories.Title: History in the making for Virgin Galactic
stories.Description: The company's inaugural commercial flight, on June 29, marks a significant milestone for commercial spaceflight, carrying a team of Italian payload specialists for a research mission.
stories.Tweet: History in the making for Virgin Galactic 📦 The company's inaugural commercial flight, on June 29, marks a significant milestone for commercial spaceflight, carrying a team of Italian payload specialists for a research mission. #virgingalactic https://spacenews.com/virgin-galactic-sets-date-and-announces-crew-for-first-commercial-spaceshiptwo-flight/

stories.Title: A year on Mars… Well, sort of
stories.Description: NASA’s CHAPEA mission begins with four volunteers entering isolation in a simulated Mars habitat. This research aims to obtain valuable data for successful human missions to the red planet.
stories.Tweet: A year on Mars… Well, sort of 📦 NASA’s CHAPEA mission begins with four volunteers entering isolation in a simulated Mars habitat. This research aims to obtain valuable data for successful human missions to the red planet. #NASA https://www.independent.co.uk/tech/nasa-mars-simulation-experiment-chapea-b2364217.html

stories.Title: Mars in ultraviolet
stories.Description: Recent photos from NASA's MAVEN reveal the stunning seasonal transformation of Mars, with its southern and northern hemispheres in vibrant new shades.
stories.Tweet: Mars in ultraviolet 📦 Recent photos from NASA's MAVEN reveal the stunning seasonal transformation of Mars, with its southern and northern hemispheres in vibrant new shades. #mars https://gizmodo.com/nasa-maven-spacecraft-images-mars-seasons-north-south-1850571845

stories.Title: Cybertruck’s latest sighting
stories.Description: The electric truck impresses with its rear-wheel steering capabilities in a new video. A technology that brings control and precision, especially when parking.
stories.Tweet: Cybertruck’s latest sighting 📦 The electric truck impresses with its rear-wheel steering capabilities in a new video. A technology that brings control and precision, especially when parking. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/06/26/tesla-cybertruck-showcases-rear-wheel-steering-inside-parking-garage/

stories.Title: Aston Martin's electrifying endeavors
stories.Description: The automaker has joined forces with Lucid, a US-based EV startup, to bring their state-of-the-art powertrain and battery systems technology to Aston Martin EVs.
stories.Tweet: Aston Martin's electrifying endeavors 📦 The automaker has joined forces with Lucid, a US-based EV startup, to bring their state-of-the-art powertrain and battery systems technology to Aston Martin EVs. #astonmartin https://arstechnica.com/cars/2023/06/lucid-will-supply-aston-martin-with-leading-edge-electric-powertrains/
